definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: We need to find relevant parameters in the comparison table and then put them into the formula.
sentences.chinese: 我們要從對照表中查到相關的參數，代入公式。

sentences.english: Even though I checked all the cross-references.
sentences.chinese: 儘管我查了全部的對照表。

sentences.english: The generic codes can be converted into typesetting commands by means of a look-up table when out put .
sentences.chinese: 分類代碼可依照一個對照表在輸出時轉換爲排字指令。

definition: Cantonese romanization/Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems
Jyutping, one of the many Cantonese romanization systems/abbr. of 粵語拼音|粤语拼音[Yue4 yu3 Pin1 yin1]
to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
Mandarin phonetic symbols (MPS), phonetic alphabet for Chinese used esp. in Taiwan, also known colloquially as Bopomofo (after the first four letters of the alphabet:ㄅㄆㄇㄈ)
Min dialects, spoken in Fujian Province, Taiwan etc
